title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 447 of 2020)) and 138 (amended by section 12 of the Social
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Claims, Payments and Control) (Amendment) (No. 4) (Treatment Benefit) 
Regulations 2022. 

(2) These Regulations and the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) Regulations 2007 to 2022 shall be construed together as 
one and may be cited together as the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) Regulations 2007 to 2022. 

Medical lenses

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 447 of 2020)) and 138 (amended by section 12 of the Social
heading: 2. The Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, Payments and Control)
text_raw:
2. The Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, Payments and Control) 
Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 142 of 2007) are amended by the insertion of the 
following article after article 110A: 

“Medical lenses 

110B. A person shall be entitled to medical appliance benefit in relation 
to the provision of medical lenses once in every two years, or such other 
frequency as may, from time to time, be fixed by the Minister.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 May, 2022. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [360] 3

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 447 of 2020)) and 138 (amended by section 12 of the Social
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide for the frequency of the payment of the grant for 
contact lenses supplied for medical reasons under the Treatment Benefit scheme 
to once every two years. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [360]
